name: Dreamy Perplexity
description:
Dreamy Perplexity is a game based on controlling two characters to solve challenging puzzles. The ultimate goal is to reach the end of each level. The game is set in a floating dream world, where falling out will cause the level to restart.

Currently contains 10 levels.

Controls for PC:

  • WASD to walk
  • Mouse drag to pan camera
  • Scroll in/out to zoom in/out
  • Space to jump
  • ESC to pause
  • R to restart
  • A switch swaps the left/right movement of the character that touches it
  • Both characters need to touch the end

Twitter: https://twitter.com/c0deb0t

Website: https://c0deb0t.wordpress.com
